findings.title: Block values as a proxy for time
findings.description: A control flow decision is made based on the block.timestamp environment variable

findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: The Solidity version used in the contract is not fixed, which can lead to unexpected behavior or security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Control Flow Decision Based on Block Timestamp
findings.description: A control flow decision is made based on the block.timestamp environment variable, which can be manipulated by miners and may lead to unintended behavior.
